title: How Do Florida’s Election Police Work?
description: Republican officials established one of the first state agencies in the country solely dedicated to election crimes and voter fraud, but the violations — 20 out of 11 million voters in 2020 — appeared inadvertent.
dc:creator: Patricia Mazzei
media:credit: Scott McIntyre for The New York Times
media:description: A voter drops a ballot at a ballot box on the last day of early voting on Saturday in Miami.
